name: A Sweet Adventure
description:
This is a short and sweet game made using Godot (First game I have ever made in Godot) and is a simplistic platformer. I made this in about 10 hours in 2 sittings over the course of a day and a half. The web version seems to have a strange audio delay, the executable however does not, I suggest using the executable instead of playing through the browser...

This game was made for the Beginners Circle Jam.

  • Credits
    Developer/Sounds: NYPDK (Discord: Koreans#9057)
    Tile Set: erayzesen
    Player Model: rvros
    Other Character Models: Sven
